sentences.en: Changing offices has left my papers in complete disarray.
sentences.cn: 办公室搬迁,使我的文件全部乱了套了.

sentences.en: He found the room in disarray, with food dumped on the floor and drawers pulled open.
sentences.cn: 他发现屋里凌乱不堪，地上丢弃着食物，抽屉大开。

sentences.en: He tried to tidy up, not wanting the maid to see the disarray.
sentences.cn: 他试图收拾一下，不想让女佣看见那里乱七八糟。

sentences.en: If the Pope's initiative succeeds, the Church of England will be further weakened and plunged into even greater disarray.
sentences.cn: 如果教皇的倡议倡议获得成功，英国教会将进一步削弱并陷入到更大的混乱中。

sentences.en: Lydia would have gone to his room and found the place in disarray.
sentences.cn: 季利娅会到他的房间去,发现那里乱七八糟.

sentences.en: She rushed out of the burning house with her clothes in disarray.
sentences.cn: 她衣衫不整地从着火的房子里奔了出来.

sentences.en: She was left lying on her side and her clothes were in disarray.
sentences.cn: 发现她时她侧躺着，且衣衫不整。

sentences.en: The child had disarray ed the books.
The contradictory statements are symptoms of disarray in the administration.
sentences.cn: 这些互相矛盾的说法反映了管理的混乱。

sentences.en: The nation is in disarray following rioting led by the military.
sentences.cn: 该国发生由军队发动的暴乱后，陷入一片混乱。

sentences.en: The peace talks broke up in disarray .
They held a dinner party, but it resulted in disarray.
sentences.cn: 他们举行宴会, 但结果却造成混乱.

sentences.en: This would add to the disarray in world markets.
sentences.cn: 这会给世界市场乱上添乱。

sentences.en: Washington has been abuzz with stories about disarray inside the White House.
sentences.cn: 整个华盛顿都对白宫内发生的混乱议论纷纷。

sentences.en: Widespread political and economic disarray threatens to make the constitution meaningless.
sentences.cn: 四处蔓延的政治和经济混乱可能会使宪法变得可有可无。

words.tran_cn: 使混乱；弄乱；使脱去衣服

trans.tran_en: the state of being untidy or not organized
the state of being untidy or not organized
